{{also|豺獭}}
==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|s=豺獭}}

===Etymology===
The [[jackal]] and [[otter]] both have reputations as animals that are fierce and ravenous. They are used as a metaphor for people that are greedy and cruel.

===Pronunciation===
{{zh-pron
|m=cháitǎ
|cat=n
}}

===Noun===
{{zh-noun}}

# {{lb|zh|literary}} [[jackal]]s and [[otter]]s
# {{lb|zh|archaic}} [[people]] that are [[greedy]] and [[cruel]]
